name: Deep Space Rage
description:
VR action-adventure game.

Explore a space station, find weapons, grab objects, hit enemies with them and destroy the final boss.

(Developed and tested with the HTC VIVE system)

--------------------------------

Group project developed in the "Videogames & Virtual Reality 2018/2019" course in the ESIIAB to learn about Unity and VR.

Made by Ansel Martínez, Leonardo Cardozo and Franky Alfaro.
